name: Vertiball
description:
Do you enjoy verticality? Does height bring you to a new height? Then boy, do I have the game for you!

VERTIBALL

Use your body to propel the ball upwards! Earn points! Crush your friends! Win at all costs!

FEATURES:
Physics-simulated sports madness
Lots of levels, wacky gameplay modifiers, visual effects, etc.
5 co-op or single player challenges
Tons of achievements and unlocks
Customize your game with character skins
Gamepad support
